item.title: HarborHarvest Dock: Self‑Powered Marina with Micro‑Wind & Hydrokinetic Energy
item.description: A next‑generation boat dock outfitted with micro‑wind turbines and underwater current turbines to generate all the energy needed for charging electric boats—fully self‑sufficient and eco‑friendly.
item.author: contact@quantumcybersolutions.com (ConTechNews)
